name: Homemade Pizza Sauce
author: Becky Essner
instructions: Mix with tomato sauce, oregano, garlic salt, and Parmesan cheese to taste. (Approximately 1/8 teaspoon each of oregano and garlic salt. Approximately 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.) Or, you can use purchased spaghetti sauce of your choice. Spread on dough.
